description: Number of distinct Abelian subgroups of the symmetric group S_n.
links: L. Naughton and G. Pfeiffer, Integer sequences realized by the subgroup pattern of the symmetric group, arXiv:1211.1911
prog: (GAP 4.4)LoadPackage("sonata");;for n in [2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10] do    p := SymmetricGroup(n) ;;    o := Order(p);    s := Subgroups(p);    f := Filtered(s, g -> IsAbelian(g));    a := Size(f);    Print(a," ") ;od; # _R. J. Mathar_, May 24 2013
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Jul 02 2001
